:py:mod:`pyslam.capture_old.common`
===================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.capture_old.common

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains logic to implement common types of sensors,
   and their associated measurements. These are built into
   the framework, but obviously custom sensors can be created
   quite easily.



Subpackages
-----------
.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :maxdepth: 3

   monocular_uncalibrated_camera/index.rst
